overview:
Partner of Earlybird

More than ten years experience as investor in high-tech enterprises; focus on green technologies and services. Involvement in several international start-up initiatives, board member at Silicon Saxony and CTI Invest

Board member of Ubitricity, Light Blue Optics and Clean Mobile. Former board observer at Esmertec

Management consultant for Boston Consulting Group and ALCATEL in communications engineering

Dipl. Phys. (MSc equivalent) in semiconductor physics, University of Ulm and Newcastle upon Tyne; MBA INSEAD, Fountainebleau
